overview_of_class: This course examines the techno scientific, sociological, historical, cultural, and environmental aspects of our energy production, distribution, and consumption.
name: Topics in Science and Technology Studies
title: DOHA INTERDIS 379-0-70 Topics in Science and Technology Studies
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for NU Qatar Juniors and Seniors Only
